_meta.description: CK2 Portrait Layer Generation Prompts for GoA: Heroes of Azeroth

style_prefix: CK2 medieval fantasy character portrait, 3/4 view facing slightly left, soft directional light from upper-left, painterly digital art style, muted earth tones with vibrant accents, visible brushstrokes, oil painting aesthetic matching Crusader Kings 2 art direction, dark vignette background
style_suffix: extremely detailed face, sharp eyes, high contrast lighting, masterwork fantasy illustration, no text, no watermark, no frame, no border, professional game asset quality

layer_instructions.base: Head and neck only, neutral expression, bare skin visible, NO hair NO clothing NO accessories, plain dark background, centered portrait crop from chest up
layer_instructions.eyes: Close-up of eyes region only, transparent/dark background around eyes, varied eye shapes and colors per frame, expressive gaze
layer_instructions.hair: Hair only on transparent background, no face visible underneath, various styles from short to long, culturally appropriate hairstyles
layer_instructions.beard: Facial hair only on transparent background, various styles from stubble to full beard, matching racial aesthetic
layer_instructions.clothes: Clothing and armor from neck to chest only, no head/face, transparent background above neckline, rank-appropriate outfit
layer_instructions.headgear: Head covering/crown/helmet only, transparent background, rank-appropriate headwear, viewed from 3/4 angle

human.description: Warcraft human, Alliance race, medieval European aesthetic with Warcraft fantasy flair

male_base.prompt: {style_prefix}, adult human male warrior-king face, {skin_tone} skin, strong jawline, weathered battle-scarred features, thick neck, prominent brow, {base_instructions}, {style_suffix}
male_base.negative: feminine, childish, cartoon, anime, orc, elf, pointed ears, green skin, tusks, horns

female_base.prompt: {style_prefix}, adult human female noble face, {skin_tone} skin, elegant but strong features, high cheekbones, determined expression, {base_instructions}, {style_suffix}
female_base.negative: masculine, childish, cartoon, anime, orc, elf, pointed ears, green skin, tusks
